Package org.forgerock.openidm.auth.modules

Class IDMAuthModuleWrapper

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.auth.modules.IDMAuthModuleWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AsyncServerAuthModule
public class IDMAuthModuleWrapper extends Object implements org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AsyncServerAuthModule
A CAF AsyncServerAuthModule that is designed to wrap any other AsyncServerAuthModule. This module provides IDM specific authentication processing to the authentication mechanism of underlying auth module.
This allows IDM to use any common auth module and still benefit from automatic role calculation and augment security context scripts (providing the authentication.json contains the required configuration).
Since:
3.0.0

    • initialize

      public org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise<Void,org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AuthenticationException> initialize(javax.security.auth.message.MessagePolicy requestMessagePolicy, javax.security.auth.message.MessagePolicy responseMessagePolicy, CallbackHandler handler, Map<String,Object> options)
      Initialises the underlying auth module with the provided parameters and constructs an instance of the RoleCalculator from the authentication configuration.
      Required configuration:
      • connectionFactory - the ConnectionFactory for making an authenticate request on the router
      • context - the Context to use when making requests on the router
      • queryOnResource - the resource to perform the role calculation query on
      • authenticationId - the object attribute that represents the authentication id
      • groupMembership - the object attribute representing the group membership
      • defaultRoles - the list of default roles
      • roleMapping - the mapping between OpenIDM roles and pass-through auth groups
      • groupComparison - the method of MappingRoleCalculator.GroupComparison to use
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AsyncServerAuthModule
      Parameters:
      requestMessagePolicy -
      responseMessagePolicy -
      handler -
      options -
      Returns:

    • validateRequest

      public org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise<javax.security.auth.message.AuthStatus,org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AuthenticationException> validateRequest(org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.MessageInfoContext messageInfo, Subject clientSubject, Subject serviceSubject)
      Provides IDM specific authentication process handling, by setting whether to log the client's IP address, and then calls the underlying auth module's validateRequest method. If the auth module returns SUCCESS, based on the authentication configuration will perform role calculation and, if present, will run the augment security context script.
      Specified by:
      validateRequest in interface org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AsyncServerAuthModule
      Parameters:
      messageInfo -
      clientSubject -
      serviceSubject -
      Returns:

    • secureResponse

      If the request contains the X-OpenIDM-NoSession header, sets the skipSession property on the MessageInfo, and then calls the underlying auth module's secureResponse method.
      Specified by:
      secureResponse in interface org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AsyncServerAuthModule
